red_flags.label: Low oxygen saturation or respiratory distress
red_flags.prompt: Escalate per protocol for low SpO2 or increased work of breathing.

red_flags.label: Hypotension or signs of shock
red_flags.prompt: Escalate per protocol for hypotension, poor perfusion, or acute decline.

red_flags.label: Severe acute mental status change
red_flags.prompt: Escalate per protocol for severe AMS or unsafe behavior.
